text: Approval for the relay thoracic stent-graft with plus delivery system. this device is indicated for the endovascular repair of fusiform aneurysms and saccular aneurysms/ penetrating atherosclerotic ulcers in the descending thoracic aorta in patients having appropriate anatomy, including:  1) iliac or femoral access vessel morphology that is compatible with vascular access techniques, devices and/or accessories; 2) non-aneurysmal aortic neck diameter in the range of 19 - 42 mm; and 3) non-aneurysmal proximal aortic neck lengths between 15 and 25 nun and distal aortic neck lengths between 25 and 30 mm depending on the diameter stent-graft required.
